roasts.name: Faster Than Light - Espresso Blend
roasts.tasting_notes: I enjoyed it most when it was very fresh, less so as it aged. When fresh, pleasently tart cherries, smooth, lingering chocolate finish.

roasts.name: Candelilla, Tarrazu, Costa Rica
roasts.tasting_notes: First cup provoked a "Wow!". Sugar cane sweetness, milk chocolate, edgy brightness that doesn't cross the line. Delicious and impressive.
